channel.title: Goal of 500m
channel.description:
I have decided to make a goal for myself. To make 500m, this week (no scams, no hacks).
How will be the question, for each step I do, whether it involves staking, or botting, I will let you know how I have done it. Hopefully my goal will be accomplished.
Day 1: Bot frost dragons on 2 accounts.
Day 2: The bots messed up when I was hanging out with friends. I made 5m (usually 30m), I diced and made 20m.
Day 3: Currently progressing.

item.title: Goal of 500m
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:14, topic:402867”][quote author=orcashark link=topic=499928.msg3663508#msg3663508 date=1310489315]
People need to see others goals and achievments.

But sereously, could like, 10m go to the Orcashark Charity? Itl go towards good funds, -cough- BGS -cough-
[/quote]
You forgot about the Stupit ‘L2Play’ Charity where It’ll help mostly one person out, moi. Mostly going to bcp[/quote]

Yes but you see. The Orcashark Charity quit awhile back, and is back now, and only has like, 800k gp. They have been trying to collect donations for awhile but people always say “Stfu noob” And walk away.

Read full topic

item.title: Goal of 500m
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

reyx7:

The only way ur gonna achieve it is with staking. Get 5m, then use the forums to find high cash stakers. Make sure that when u gamble, ur loss will only set u back 1-2 stakes. Then, bid this much in this order. It goes starting cash to new amount, then from there its amount gambled to current cash. 5m to 10m, 5m to 15m, 10m to 25m, 15m to 40m, 25m to 65m, 40m to 105m, 65m to 170m, 105m to 275m, 170m to 445m, then 55m to 500m.

Not really true, there’s hundreds of other ways to do it, I would rather merch for around 30m a day for login in once then risk 30m to make 30m.

Read full topic

omg … botting frost drags at 2 accounts means u have 2 accounts with 85 dung and high cmb lvl >>

sounds >>****<<

nvm >>

gl bro ^^
